overview: Snuggle up with six cute and cuddly episodes from the Original Care Bears Series! This collection of colorful tales from the clouds of Care-A-Lot is sure to delight fans of all ages. Filled with dreamy adventures, wonderful friendships and lessons of love and laughter, the Care Bears crew has spread the values of sharing and caring for over 30 years!
title: Care Bears: Cuddles in Care-A-Lot
